verbs.description: atiku [V: running] [ARG0: mate] why southeast shoud not let go by law mefor in line with those reasoned and adopted prescriptions of the ekweremadu committee the entire dozen pdp aspirants came from the north rather than allow atiku abubakar pick his running mate from the southeast kite fliers are at it presenting him with alluring reasons he has to jettison the accepted committee recommendations which even produced him as the party flag - bearer kano obasanjo osun senate vice president peter obi ekweremadu committee cbn vp political party lagos apc pdp ambode rabiu musa kwankwaso dr law mefor southwest anambra ndigbo dr alex ekwueme shakespeare ngozi okonjo - iweala executive party nigeria abuja atiku apga port harcourt ike ekweremadu tinubu africa prime minister southeast apc by schneider electric ahmed bola tinubu president southwestern united states senator ike ekweremadu kwakwasiyya buhari jimi agbaje ngozi sahara reporters zik chukwuma soludo atiku abubakar president and vice ekiti psychologist and journalist
